actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the previously existing suspension of duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on: (1) Neville and Winter's acid; (2) Broenner's acid; (3) D Salt; (4) napthol AS types; and (5) anis base.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1995, the previously existing suspension of duty on certain chemicals.
